title: Fix VectorDistance to similarity conversion (negative scores bug)
description:
**Type:** bug
**Severity:** CRITICAL

## Problem
CosmosDB VectorDistance with cosine metric returns values in [0, 2] range, but code assumed [0, 1] and used 1 - distance formula.

This caused:
- Distance 1.2 → Similarity -0.2 (NEGATIVE!)
- Distance 1.8 → Similarity -0.8 (NEGATIVE!)
- Good chunks filtered out due to negative hybrid scores

## Fix
Added distance_to_similarity() helper that normalizes [0,2] to [0,1] and clamps result.

## File
digihub-chatbot-query-pipeline/src/services/retrieval_service.py

## Commit
7959fd2

- No service line detected from generic query
- System searches ALL service lines (4,390 chunks)
- Euro Customer Advisory Board has 711 meeting note chunks that dilute results

- serviceNameid = 0 (General Info)
- serviceNameid = 440 (Operational Support)

This ensures generic DigiHub questions find user guide content.

title: Add content type boosting for UserGuide and DigiHubUserGuide

- 96 BillingUpdate chunks vs 5 DigiHubUserGuide chunks in Billing

Content types to boost:
- UserGuide (Operational Support docs)
- DigiHubUserGuide (General Info, Billing user guides)

Content types to NOT boost (or penalize):
- BillingUpdate (newsletters)
- MeetingNotes
- Others
- Survey
